description.value:
This sprig of berry-festooned holly and mistletoe doesn't wilt or rot. It can be used as a primal locus, and it grants a +2 item bonus to Nature checks while you wear it.

Activate—Anoint 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You squeeze juice from one of the berries and smear it onto a weapon made primarily of wood to cast a 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Weapon] on it, or onto a creature to cast a 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Runic Body] body on it.

Activate—Bind 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You touch the sprig, then a tree to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.One with Plants] upon yourself, turning into a vine on the touched tree.

Activate—Cultivate 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You plant the greater primeval mistletoe into an area of natural earth or stone. Once planted, the plant immediately sprouts into an area of holly bushes that don't impede movement and that pulse with vitality energy, replicating the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Field of Life] spell. You can Sustain the activation up to 1 minute. When this magic ends, the holly bushes revert back into the original greater primeval mistletoe.
